facelet-taglib.description: This is a copy of omnifaces-ui.taglib.xml with old namespace for sake of backwards compatibility. This will be removed in a future OmniFaces version. So you need to migrate XML namespace from http://omnifaces.org/ui to omnifaces.ui namespace as soon as possible.

tag.description: Please migrate XML namespace from http://omnifaces.org/ui to omnifaces.ui as soon as possible.
